arm_group.description: Healthy eating control involves healthy eating content delivered in a 90 minute group session with two follow up phone calls.

Cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia includes content on sleep restriction, stimulus control, relaxation, cognitive restructuring and sleep hygiene content delivered in a 90 minute group intervention with two follow up phone calls.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine whether cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) is
      effective for insomnia in lung cancer survivors.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)-Insomnia for Lung Cancer

detailed_description.textblock:
A randomized controlled clinical trial will be used to test the efficacy of this brief CBT-I
      compared to attention control on sleep, mood, functional status and quality of life in lung
      cancer survivors and evaluate the feasibility of translating an evidence-based CBT-I into
      the clinical setting.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  6 weeks from surgery for stage 1 or 2 Non Small Cell Lung Cancer

          -  chronic insomnia

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Other preexisting sleep disorders

          -  Unstable medical illnesses

intervention.description: Cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia includes content on sleep restriction, stimulus control, relaxation, cognitive restructuring and sleep hygiene content delivered in a 90 minute group intervention with two follow up phone calls.
Healthy eating control involves healthy eating content delivered in a 90 minute group session with two follow up phone calls.

clinical_study.official_title: Translating CBT-Insomnia for Lung Cancer Into Practice: A RCT

overall_official.affiliation: SUNY University at Buffalo School of Nursing

primary_outcome.description: Five weeks after the intervention sleep efficiency will be compared to pre-intervention sleep efficiency.
